page.title: 03ACTIVITIES.
page.content: Though about 50% of householders are retired, it is a happy and active community. The{Bell Inn}is a free House with good food, darts,quoits and pool club. There are 3 intact unused {cider mills,}1 at the Bell,1 at Lower House,1 at Gatehouse. The{village hall}an old army hut re- erected in 1925/6 is to be replaced. Chair of the committee is C.E.Barker, Treasurer Mrs E.Barker and Mrs R.Jones is Secretary. There are many branch committees involved in every aspect of acquiring a new hall. Here the{W.I. } meet (32 members). On Tuesdays and Thursdays the{Playgroup}meet, Mothers and Toddlers on Wednesday mornings, altogether 30 children. The{Whist}Club (60) meet every week ex. December, the {Youth Club}(22/25), meet every Friday.
